strapiSongs.title: The Ceremony of Forgiveness
strapiSongs.lyrics:
I’ll say I’m sorry
Though you may not return
I plead you for forgiveness
That I may not deserve

Life can be so tragic
For those of us who feel
The pain that’s felt within the heart
Inside may never heal

I love you
strapiSongs.credits: Music by Victor Fisher of Reenchantment.
strapiSongs.description: This song describes the feeling of guilt that often accompanies the loss of love. It is one of the best examples of my atmospheric rock sound.
